abstract: A consortium of private equity firms agreed to pay $8.5 billion, nearly $2 billion less than the original agreement.
snippet: A consortium of private equity firms agreed to pay $8.5 billion, nearly $2 billion less than the original agreement.
lead_paragraph: Home Depot agreed today to sell its commercial supply business to a consortium of private equity firms for $8.5 billion, nearly $2 billion less than the original agreement. It is one of the first big buyouts to be renegotiated as a result of the recent tightening of credit and problems in the housing market.

byline.original: By Andrew Ross Sorkin and Michael J. de la Merced

abstract: As the credit markets tighten, some investors fret that the renegotiated deal for Home Depot’s wholesale supply unit may be an omen for other buyouts.
snippet: As the credit markets tighten, some investors fret that the renegotiated deal for Home Depot’s wholesale supply unit may be an omen for other buyouts.
lead_paragraph: As the deal for Home Depot’s wholesale supply unit was renegotiated over the weekend, a question lingered about whether the push to lower the price was a harbinger for other buyouts.

headline.main: Redone Home Depot Deal Not Thought Contagious

byline.original: By Andrew Ross Sorkin and Michael J. de la Merced

abstract: Home Depot said on Tuesday that it was lowering the price of its wholesale supply unit business by nearly $2 billion, confirming media reports. As previously reported, the retailer will sell HD Supply to a consortium of private equity firms for $8.5 billion, while holding onto a 12.5 percent stake in the unit and backing $1 billion in financing.
lead_paragraph: Home Depot said on Tuesday that it was lowering the price of its wholesale supply unit business by nearly $2 billion, confirming media reports. As previously reported, the retailer will sell HD Supply to a consortium of private equity firms for $8.5 billion, while holding onto a 12.5 percent stake in the unit and backing $1 billion in financing.

headline.main: Home Depot Confirms New Price for Supply Unit
